name: Momo Horror House
description:
Momo Horror Game story of message by user "Momo". Scary message was received by hero & now he locked in house with scary Momo screamer ghost! Horror story will ends after you collect all papers in house. You can find them exploring furniture & hidden places. Beware ghost - try to not look at it!

Momo House Game Features: 
- Horror atmosphere
- Hidden Screamer
- Hidden objects game elements
- Horror sounds
- Doors & Keys to find
